ComicInfo.Summary: ...And the Walls Came Tumbling Down!: The Hulkbusters try to take on the Hulk but, even with the help of a ton of Avengers, they can't stop the jade giant. The doctor tells Betty that when Bruce was separated from the Hulk, the process was incomplete, and both Bruce and the Hulk are now dying. She-Hulk arrives at the battle scene to try and soothe the savage beast but is punched out for her trouble. The Avengers decide to try and kill the Hulk.
ComicInfo.Title: ...And the Walls Came Tumbling Down!
